item.Q:
Write the character:
1: take part in; participate; join; attend; to join; unequal; varied; irregular; to counsel; uneven; not uniform; abbr. for Senate, Upper House
2: ginseng
item.A:
traditional: 參
1: cān 2: shēn
参加 (參加) cānjīa to participate; to take part; to join 海参 (海參) hǎishēn sea cucumber

item.Q:

sort; kind; class; way; manner
item.A:
般 (strokes unavailable)
bān
百般 bǎibān in hundred and one ways; in every possible way; by every means

mìng
革命 gémìng (political) revolution

item.Q:
Write the character:
to look at; to regard; to inspect
item.A:
traditional: 視
shì
重视 (重視) zhòngshì to attach importance to sth; to value

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to look at; to watch; to observe; to behold; concept; point of view
2: Taoist monastery
item.A:
traditional: 觀
1: guān 2: guàn
客观 (客觀) kèguān objective 壮观 (壯觀) zhuàngguàn spectacular

item.A:
traditional: 聯
lián

脑 (strokes unavailable)

nǎo

péng
